1370: Tijs moved to Breestraat.A.25 after marriage.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 24 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Marcibilia, at age 24.
1371: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Hodine, at age 25.
Lost daughter Hodine when Hodine was 1 years old.
1372: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Truden, at age 26.
1373: Lost daughter Truden when Truden was 2 years old.
1378: Had a son with Gertrudis, Eltetus, at age 32.
1386: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Tetta, at age 40.
1387: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Siwa, at age 41.
